mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.user_name, ur.role_id, p.menu_code, p.permission_code FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.delete_status = '1' WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
